description: Try our easy to follow Oriental Roast Pork Chops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Oriental Roast Pork Chops Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 green apple, cored and thinly sliced
4 tbs Ayam Honey & Soy Marinade Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cutlets into a shallow dish and pour over the marinade. Turn to coat and set aside for 20 minutes.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking dish with baking paper and place a wire rack into the dish.
Roast cutlets for 45 minutes (depending on size and thickness) until cooked, basting occasionally with the marinade.

Meanwhile, soak the noodles in boiling water for 5 minutes until soft. Drain and toss with the sesame oil and lime juice. Add the carrot, bean sprouts, onion, apple and coriander leaves. Toss to combine.
Serve pork on a bed of the warm noodles and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
